name: Slot Master
description:
The game is about a Slot Machine, with the following features:

  • The player can stop each reel separately.
  • There’s a timer for the slot machine, when it reaches zero seconds, all reels stop at random times.
  • When all reels are stopped, a prize, if any, is given to the player in the form of virtual money.
  • The spin button will consume a ticket from the player.
  • The player can buy a ticket with their virtual money.
  • The tickets will also have a timer running down if the player has less than 7 tickets. When it reaches zero, the player gains a ticket.
  • The player can level up by paying a certain amount, and gain different abilities, like:
    • Gaining more seconds on the reel timer.
    • Gaining % more on prizes.
    • Slowing down a reel while holding the stop button.
  • The player’s money, tickets and level are all saved and persist between sessions.
  • There’s music and sound effects attached to most actions.
